Class YUVUtils

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.ui.views.camera.YUVUtils

public class YUVUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Static methods for mapping between RGB and YUV colour spaces.

Author:
Dan Cowan

convertRGBtoYUV

public static YUV convertRGBtoYUV(org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB rgb)
Change an RGB colour to YUV (YCrCb) colour. The colour value conversion is independent of the colour range. Colours could be 0-1 or 0-255.

Parameters:
rgb - The RGB components to convert
Returns:
yuv equivalent YUV

convertYUVtoRGB

public static org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB convertYUVtoRGB(YUV yuv)
Change an YUV (YCrCb) colour to RGB colour. The colour value conversion is independent of the colour range. Colours could be 0-1 or 0-255.

Parameters:
yuv - The YUV components to convert
rgb - equivalent RGB

Color
